data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance to GIDC for developing multi-storied shed in estates - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme would provide assistance upto 70% of the allotment price of Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation.
data.eligibility:
Entrepreneur should belong to Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe category and belong to Micro or Small Enterprise.
Trading industry and industries mentioned in additional information are ineligible.
data.conditions:
1. Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation has to construct multi- storeyed structure having shed measuring upto 100 sq. mt. with adequate infrastructure like electricity, water, drainage and sanitation, lift for transport of materials and manpower, etc.
  2. Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation will determine the allotment price and submit it for perusal of State Level Empowered Committee (SLEC) and same shall not be increased for five years from the date of first allotment.
  3. The unit have to commence production within time period fixed by Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation
  4. Trading activity will not be eligible under the scheme.
data.beneficiaries:
Entrepreneur should belong to Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe category and belong to Micro or Small Enterprise.
Trading industry and industries mentioned in additional information are ineligible.
data.prerequisites:
1. Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation has to construct multi- storeyed structure having shed measuring upto 100 sq. mt. with adequate infrastructure like electricity, water, drainage and sanitation, lift for transport of materials and manpower, etc.
  2. Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation will determine the allotment price and submit it for perusal of State Level Empowered Committee (SLEC) and same shall not be increased for five years from the date of first allotment.
  3. The unit have to commence production within time period fixed by Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation
  4. Trading activity will not be eligible under the scheme.
data.context: The Industrial Policy 2020 envisions Gujarat as a global business destination for next-generation sustainable manufacturing and service industry that stimulates sustainable development, inclusive and a balanced regional growth. The primary mission of the Industrial Policy includes support for development of MSMEs, focus on Export Competitiveness : Vocal for Local to become Global and thus strengthen integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide assistance to entrepreneurs for acquiring shed in Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation estates.
data.description:
1. The enterprise will be eligible for assistance upto 70% of the allotment price of Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation
  2. On payment of 30% allotment price, Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation will hand over the possession of the Shed and submit the claim of subsidy upto 70% of the allotment price to the MSME Commissionerate.
data.how_to_apply: The claim will be submitted by Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation to MSME Commission rate but the benefit will be given to the enterprises.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be release after the approval by State Level Empowered Committee, subject to availability of grant.
data.additional_info:
The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail assistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.

  1. Ineligible Services-
    • Hotels and Motels, inns, resorts providing short term lodging facilities; includes accommodation in house boats Provision of short term lodging facilities to members of a particular organization such as govt. guest houses, company guest houses, circuit houses and similar establishments Provision of short stay accommodation n.e.c. (e.g. holiday homes, private guest houses etc.)
    • Camping grounds, recreational vehicle parks and trailer parks
    • Accommodation provided by student residences, school dormitories Worker hostels and boarding houses
    • Restaurants without bars
    • Cafeterias, fast-food restaurants and other food preparation in market stalls Ice cream mobile vendors, mobile food carts
    • Restaurant and bar activities connected to transportation, when carried out by separate units
    • Event catering
    • Activities of food service contractors (e.g. for transportation companies)
    • Operation of canteens or (e.g. for factories, offices, hospitals or schools) on a concession basis
    • Bars and Restaurants with bars Tea/coffee shops
    • Fruit juice bars Mobile beverage vendors
    • Real estate activities with own or leased property
    • Real estate activities on a fee or contract basis
    • Activities of head offices Management consultancy activities
    • Advertising Market research and public opinion polling
    • Renting and leasing of recreational and sports goods
    • Leasing of nonfinancial intangible assets
    • Activities of employment placement agencies
    • Temporary employment agency activities
    • Human resources provision and management of human resources functions
    • Private security activities
    • Security systems service activities
    • Investigation activities General public service activities relating to executive
    • General public service activities relating to legislation
    • General public service activities n.e.c.
    • Regulatory agencies relating to education
    • Foreign affairs
    • Defence activities Public order and safety activities
    • Compulsory social security activities
    • Pre-primary education (education preceding the first level)
    • Primary education (education at the first level)
    • Provision of literacy programmes for adults at primary level
    • Special education for handicapped students at primary level
    • Other primary education activities n.e.c.
    • General school education in the first stage of the secondary level (up to X th standard) without any special subject pre-requisite
    • General school education in the second stage of the secondary level (Senior/ Higher secondary) giving, in principle, access to higher education
    • Special education for handicapped students at first stage or second stage of secondary level
    • Technical and vocational education below the level of higher education except for handicapped
    • Technical and vocational education for handicapped students below the level of higher education
    • Professional motor driving school
    • Higher education in science, commerce, humanity and fine arts leading to a university degree or equivalent
    • Higher education in engineering / other technical courses leading to a university degree or equivalent
    • Higher education in medical/bio-technology and related courses leading to a university degree or equivalent
    • Higher education in management courses leading to a degree or equivalent
    • Higher education in law leading to a degree or equivalent
    • Higher education in other professional/ vocational courses leading to a degree or equivalent
    • Higher education not leading to a degree or equivalent
    • Sports and recreation education
    • Cultural education Academic tutoring services
    • Professional examination review courses
    • Flying school
    • Motor driving school (non-professional)
    • Other educational services n.e.c.
    • Educational support services
    • Library and archives activities
    • Museums activities and operation of historical sites and buildings
    • Botanical and zoological gardens and nature reserves activities
    • Wholesale of lottery tickets
    • Retail sale of lottery tickets
    • Other gambling and betting activities
    • Operation of sports facilities Activities of sports clubs
    • Other sports activities
    • Activities of amusement parks and theme parks
    • Other amusement and recreation activities n.e.c.
    • Activities of business and employers membership organizations
    • Activities of professional membership organizations Activities of trade unions
    • Activities of religious organizations
    • Activities of political organizations
    • Activities of other membership organizations n.e.c.
    • Hairdressing and other beauty treatment Funeral and related activities
    • Social activities such as escort services, marriage bureaus
    • Pet care services such as boarding, grooming and training pets etc.
    • Shoe shiners, porters, valet car parkers etc.
    • Activities of sauna and steam baths, massage salons etc.
    • Astrological and spiritualists activities
    • Activities of aaya, dhai, governess, baby sitter etc.
    • General household maintenance activities like grooming of the floor, dusting, cleaning of utensils etc.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
2. Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise (MOA or AOA) 
3. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
5. CA certificate for fixed capital investment 
6. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
7. Copy of GST Registration (if applicable) 
8. Copy of GST return of previous financial year (if applicable) 
9. Copy of ITR of the last financial year (if applicable) 
10. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
11. Power of attorney/Board resolution/ Consent letter 
12. Supporting Documents for SC/ST Enterprise
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:

Gandhinagar-382010

For other addresses visit- https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/districtindustrieslist

Contact Details: 079 23258386, 079 23258387, 079 23258381
